reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 66/06: DESIGNATED AGENCIES (DEFINITION OF 'CROWN EMPLOYEE')
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 66/06: DESIGNATED AGENCIES (DEFINITION OF 'CROWN EMPLOYEE')
reg_info.act_under: Public Service Act   Loi sur la fonction publique

content.content: 1. The following are designated agencies of the Crown for the purposes of the definition of “Crown employee” in section 1 of the Act: 1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002. 1.1 Local health integration networks as defined in section 2 of the Local Health System Integration Act, 2006. 2. Corporations and entities listed in Schedule 1.  O. Reg. 66/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 335/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are designated agencies of the Crown for the purposes of the definition of “Crown employee” in section 1 of the Act:

1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002.

1.1 Local health integration networks as defined in section 2 of the Local Health System Integration Act, 2006.

2. Corporations and entities listed in Schedule 1.  O. Reg. 66/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 335/06, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 66/06, s. 2. Schedule 1   Corporations and Entities Algonquin Forestry Authority Greater Toronto Transit Authority Liquor Control Board of Ontario McMichael Canadian Art Collection Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation The Niagara Parks Commission Ontario Housing Corporation Ontario Public Service Pension Board Ontario Realty Corporation Ottawa Congress Centre Science North Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal Workplace Safety and Insurance Board O. Reg. 66/06, Sched. 1; O. Reg. 335/06, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 66/06, s. 2.
